channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-19521] Fix time unit mismatch in method updateDeferredMetrics
item.description:
Fix time unit mismatch in method updateDeferredMetrics.

The time unit of passed param is nanos. But rpcmetrics's is mills.
item.summary: Fix time unit mismatch in method updateDeferredMetrics

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

The time unit of passed param is nanos. But rpcmetrics's is mills.

slfan1989 commented on PR #7557:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7557#issuecomment-2771070896

> Hi @KeeProMise @slfan1989 , Could you please help review this simple modification when you have free time? Thanks.
> More details please see the above description of this PR.

From my perspective, this change is fine. However, I noticed that the previous PR was reviewed by KeeProMise, so it would be best to have @KeeProMise review this one as well.

hfutatzhanghb closed pull request #7557: HADOOP-19521. Fix time unit mismatch in method updateDeferredMetrics.
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7557

hfutatzhanghb commented on PR #7557:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7557#issuecomment-2771242503

Hi, @slfan1989 @KeeProMise There should be a better way to fix this problem, i will close this pr temporarily and try another approach. Once done, will open again.

hfutatzhanghb opened a new pull request, #7571:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7571

      1. Description of PR
        Fix time unit mismatch in method updateDeferredMetrics. The time unit of passed param is nanos. But rpcmetrics's is mills.
        ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cc9ddd01-e988-4743-9efc-c0e48e08701d)

This pr refactor the method updateDeferredMetrics and remove the third parameter processingTime which can be obtained from the ProcessingDetails object within a RpcCall.

hfutatzhanghb commented on PR #7571:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7571#issuecomment-2771413962

@slfan1989 @KeeProMise @Hexiaoqiao I think fix the bug with this approach is better. Could you please help review this PR again when have free time? Thanks!
